description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker gained the abilities of a spider and became Spider-Man.
name: Spider-Man

description: Genius inventor Tony Stark creates a suit of powered armor to save his life and become the superhero Iron Man.
name: Iron Man

description: Amazonian princess Diana of Themyscira fights for justice as Wonder Woman.
name: Wonder Woman

description: Bruce Wayne, a wealthy businessman, fights crime as Batman using his intellect, physical prowess, and an array of gadgets.
name: Batman

description: Born on the planet Krypton, Kal-El was sent to Earth as a baby, where he grew up to become Superman, the world's greatest superhero.
name: Superman
